name: AppLock Themes
description:
*****************************************************************
The BEST Lock Screen App available!
- Unique Lock Screens only available with AppLock Themes!
- NEW Lock Screens!
- NEW Themes!
*****************************************************************

- Piano lock? Yes!
- Live Wallpapers? Yes!

AppLock Themes provides professionally designed themes, styles, and backgrounds for you lock screen.

It is simple to use! You select your screen, save it, and use it! If you want, you make mods before you save for a more custom and personalized look!

Get the best Lock Screen wallpaper for YOUR phone. This app allows to choose from dozens of unique and awesome wallpapers. Enhance the look of your phone with wallpapers from various artists created just for you.

- NO In-app purchases
- FREE UPDATES!

Get started now!

Note: This app does not change your home screen interface natively. It helps you utilize very cool wallpapers to enhance the create a custom look.
